books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West.
books.name: THE FOUR WINDS

books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Windsor Horne Lockwood III might rectify cold cases connected to his family that have eluded the F.B.I. for decades.
books.name: WIN

books.author: by Jacqueline Winspear
books.description: The 16th book in the Maisie Dobbs series. As Nazi occupation increases, Maisie looks into a possible murder that might affect Britain’s war efforts.
books.name: THE CONSEQUENCES OF FEAR

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The 57th book in the Stone Barrington series. A double threat with friends in high places awaits Stone in Maine.
books.name: DOUBLE JEOPARDY

books.author: by Janet Evanovich and Steve Hamilton
books.description: The seventh book in the Fox and O’Hare series. Kate and Nick seek help from their fathers as they go after a shadowy international organization in search of a lost train full of Nazi gold.
books.name: THE BOUNTY

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An N.Y.P.D. detective asks the son of a struggling single mother to use his unnatural ability to track a killer.
books.name: LATER

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: Three people involved in a love triangle find everything they hold dear is tested as Mussolini’s power grows and laws change in Rome.
books.name: ETERNAL

books.author: by Kate Quinn
books.description: As a post-World War II royal wedding approaches, an encrypted letter resurrects an alliance between three female code breakers.
books.name: THE ROSE CODE

books.author: by Sister Souljah
books.description: In a sequel to “The Coldest Winter Ever,” Winter Santiaga emerges after time served and seeks revenge.
books.name: LIFE AFTER DEATH

books.author: by Kazuo Ishiguro
books.description: An “Artificial Friend” named Klara is purchased to serve as a companion to an ailing 14-year-old girl.
books.name: KLARA AND THE SUN

books.author: by Madeline Miller
books.description: A reimagining of Homer’s “Iliad” that is narrated by Achilles' companion Patroclus.
books.name: THE SONG OF ACHILLES

books.author: by Julia Quinn
books.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”
books.name: THE DUKE AND I

books.author: by Chris Whitaker
books.description: Trouble might start for the chief of police and a self-proclaimed outlaw teenager when a man is released from prison.
books.name: WE BEGIN AT THE END

books.author: by V.E. Schwab
books.description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
books.name: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE
